snippet: The company says two-thirds of its stores will discontinue Satisfries, and the rest will offer them as a limited-time item.
abstract: Burger King Corp says it will phase out its low-fat, low-calorie Satisfries in two-thirds of its locations.
lead_paragraph: The company says two-thirds of its stores will discontinue Satisfries, and the rest will offer them as a limited-time item.

headline.main: Burger King to Phase Out Lower-Fat French Fries
headline.print_headline: Burger King to Phase Out Lower-Fat French Fries
